name: Unlit Souls
description:
Controls (Works best on controller)

You can practice on the training dummy at the start of the game (with lock on)

L1Parry / BlockR1Attack (Attack at the end once to combo)CircleHold to sprint, tap to rollXInteractSquareHealLeft StickMove PlayerRight StickMove Camera (Click to lockon)Left/RightWhilst locked on, change targets
